message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $130. I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it provides.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $120. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $125?
I understand your position, Alice. However, I can't go above $120. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
